about_the_game:
When your character "Bob" gets shot out of the air in his airplane he soon discovers that he is forced to work by digging and collecting gold for the evil boss man against his will. Bob will have to try and escape by talking to people and also by using the mystical powers that this island provides. Bob will find through trial and error that he is invincible but still trapped. He will have to use his brain and with the help of new friends and certain animal abilities there may be a chance to save them all!


Escape from Manimal island is a single player RPG escape game!

The locals have named it Manimal Island because of the islands ability for humans to turn into animals using specific jewels!

......................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................
Features:

To get by various obstacles you will have to become certain animals to overcome those obstacles. An example is where you will need to become a bird to fly over hills by pressing "Q" on the keyboard or by using the left trigger on a controller or become a snake to climb under rocks.

If you are ever unclear about what you should be doing next then just push the "T" on your keyboard or the right trigger on controller and the task at hand will be displayed.

There are automatic save points throughout the game so you can continue on your adventure whenever you want to.

The game instructions are easy to follow because any important information is clearly written on the screen at all times unless toggled off.

This game is designed to play using Keyboard or a controller!
........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................

We at Mayhem Game Studios LLC hope you enjoy this adventure and also look forward to you joining us for many more!

name: Escape from Manimal Island
short_description: Escape from Manimal island is a relaxed paced linear role playing adventure. This game would appeal to those who want to figure out the puzzle of finding your way off of Manimal island without being chased and or hunted while doing so. It is story driven with easy on the screen instructions!
